blocks.name: cmend
blocks.content: Syntax for module endomorphism algebra.
blocks.origin: const class cmend { MEndo }

blocks.name: diff.cmend.s
diff.cmend.c
diff.cmend.w
df-mend
blocks.content: Define the endomorphism algebra of a module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mend(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cmend, cmpt(s0, universe, csb(s1, co(cv(s0), clmhm, cv(s0)), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(s1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s1), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(s0))), cv(s3)))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s1), cv(s1), ccom(cv(s2), cv(s3))))), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), cfv(csca, cv(s0))), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cmpo(s2, s3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(s0))), cv(s1), co(cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s2))), cof(cfv(cvsca, cv(s0))), cv(s3)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-mend(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ MEndo =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶[(s0[LMHom]s0)/ s1]({ <(Base ` ndx), s1 >, <(+ ` ndx),(s2 ‚àà s1, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[oF((+ ` s0))]s3))>, <(√ó ` ndx),(s2 ‚àà s1, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àò s3))> } ‚ãÉ { <(Scalar ` ndx),(Scalar ` s0)>, <(√ó ` ndx),(s2 ‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` s0)), s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(((Base ` s0)√ó { s2 })[oF((√ó ` s0))]s3))> }))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: algstr
blocks.content: Lemma to shorten proofs of ~ algbase through ~ algvsca . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Nov-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm algstr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wbr(c0, cstr, cop(nat1, nat6))
  -| wceq(c0, cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c3)), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), c4), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c5))))
} = {
  eqbrtri(c0, cstr, cop(nat1, nat6), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c3)), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), c4), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c5))))
  strleun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c3)), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), c4), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c5)), nat1, nat6, nat3, nat5)
  rngstr(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c3)), c1, c2, c3)
  eqid(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c3)))
  strle2(cfv(csca, cnx), c4, cfv(cvsca, cnx), c5, nat5, nat6)
  5nn()
  scandx()
  5lt6()
  6nn()
  vscandx()
  3lt5()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm algstr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ c0[Struct]< 1, 6 >
  ‚ä£ c0 =({ <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(+ ` ndx), c2 >, <(√ó ` ndx), c3 > } ‚ãÉ { <(Scalar ` ndx), c4 >, <(√ó ` ndx), c5 > })
} = {
  eqbrtri(c0, cstr, < 1, 6 >, ({ <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(+ ` ndx), c2 >, <(√ó ` ndx), c3 > } ‚ãÉ { <(Scalar ` ndx), c4 >, <(√ó ` ndx), c5 > }))
  strleun({ <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(+ ` ndx), c2 >, <(√ó ` ndx), c3 > }, { <(Scalar ` ndx), c4 >, <(√ó ` ndx), c5 > }, nat1, nat6, nat3, nat5)
  rngstr({ <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(+ ` ndx), c2 >, <(√ó ` ndx), c3 > }, c1, c2, c3)
  eqid({ <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(+ ` ndx), c2 >, <(√ó ` ndx), c3 > })
  strle2((Scalar ` ndx), c4, (√ó ` ndx), c5, nat5, nat6)
  5nn()
  scandx()
  5lt6()
  6nn()
  vscandx()
  3lt5()
}

blocks.name: mendval
blocks.content: Value of the module endomorphism algebra. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mendval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cmend, c0), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c4)), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), c5), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c6)))))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, clmhm, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, c0)), cv(s1))))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cbs, c5), c2, co(cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cv(s0))), cof(cfv(cvsca, c0)), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cmend, c0), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c4)), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), c5), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c6)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cmend, cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c4)), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), c5), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c6))), csb(hs1, co(cv(hs0), clmhm, cv(hs0)), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0))), cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cv(hs1), co(cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0))), cof(cfv(cvsca, cv(hs0))), cv(s1))))))))
  eqtrd(csb(hs1, co(cv(hs0), clmhm, cv(hs0)), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0))), cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cv(hs1), co(cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0))), cof(cfv(cvsca, cv(hs0))), cv(s1))))))), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c4)), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), c5), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c6))), csb(hs1, c2, cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0))), cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cv(hs1), co(cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0))), cof(cfv(cvsca, cv(hs0))), cv(s1))))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1d(hs1, co(cv(hs0), clmhm, cv(hs0)), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0))), cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cv(hs1), co(cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0))), cof(cfv(cvsca, cv(hs0))), cv(s1)))))), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbied(hs1, c2, cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0))), cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cv(hs1), co(cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0))), cof(cfv(cvsca, cv(hs0))), cv(s1)))))), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c4)), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), c5), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c6))), universe, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqelr(c2, universe, co(cv(hs0), clmhm, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(co(cv(hs0), clmhm, cv(hs0)), c2, co(c0, clmhm, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  anidms(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), clmhm, cv(hs0)), co(c0, clmhm, c0)))
  oveq12(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0), c0, clmhm)
  ovex(cv(hs0), clmhm, cv(hs0))
  uneq12d(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0))), cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cv(hs1), co(cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0))), cof(cfv(cvsca, cv(hs0))), cv(s1))))), ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c4)), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), c5), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c6)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  tpeq123d(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0))), cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), c4), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  opeq2d(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  opeq2d(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0))), cv(s1))), c3, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  syl6eqr(cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0))), cv(s1))), c3, cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, c0)), cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0))), cv(s1)), c2, c2, co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, c0)), cv(s1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  oveqdr(s0, s1, cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0))), cof(cfv(cplusg, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0))), cof(cfv(cplusg, c0))), wceq(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cplusg)
  ofeq(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  opeq2d(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))), c4, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  syl6eqr(cmpo(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))), c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs1), ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2, c2, ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  eqidd(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))

  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cfv(cvsca, cv(hs0)), cfv(cvsca, c0)))

  mendval(s0, s1, c3, universe, c1, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, co(cv(s0), cof(c2), cv(s1))), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cfv(csca, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c3)), c1, co(cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), csn(cv(s0))), cof(cfv(cvsca, c3)), cv(s1))))

  mendbas(c3, c0)

  fvexi(c1, cbs, c0)
  algaddg(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, co(cv(s0), cof(c2), cv(s1))), universe, cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, co(cv(s0), cof(c2), cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), cfv(csca, c3)), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c3)), c1, co(cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), csn(cv(s0))), cof(cfv(cvsca, c3)), cv(s1)))))), c1, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cfv(csca, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c3)), c1, co(cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), csn(cv(s0))), cof(cfv(cvsca, c3)), cv(s1))))
  eqid(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, co(cv(s0), cof(c2), cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), cfv(csca, c3)), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c3)), c1, co(cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), csn(cv(s0))), cof(cfv(cvsca, c3)), cv(s1)))))))

thm mendvscafval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wceq(cfv(cvsca, c0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, co(cxp(c3, csn(cv(s0))), cof(c4), cv(s1))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmend, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvsca, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  eqtri(cfv(cvsca, c0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, co(cxp(c3, csn(cv(s0))), cof(c4), cv(s1))), cfv(cvsca, cfv(cmend, c5)))

  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cvsca, cfv(cmend, c5)), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, co(cxp(c3, csn(cv(s0))), cof(c4), cv(s1)))), wcel(c5, universe))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cvsca, cfv(cmend, c5)), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, co(cxp(c3, csn(cv(s0))), cof(c4), cv(s1))), cfv(cvsca, cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, c5)), cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), c6), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, co(cxp(c3, csn(cv(s0))), cof(c4), cv(s1))))))), wcel(c5, universe))
  fveq2d(cvsca, cfv(cmend, c5), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, c5)), cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), c6), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, co(cxp(c3, csn(cv(s0))), cof(c4), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c5, universe))
  mendval(s0, s1, c5, universe, c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, c5)), cv(s1))), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))), c6, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, co(cxp(c3, csn(cv(s0))), cof(c4), cv(s1))))
  eqtr4i(c2, co(c5, clmhm, c5), cfv(cbs, c0))
  mendbas(c5, c0)
  eqid(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, co(cv(s0), cof(cfv(cplusg, c5)), cv(s1))))
  eqid(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, ccom(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  mpoeq123i(s0, s1, c1, c2, co(cxp(c3, csn(cv(s0))), cof(c4), cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, c6), c2, co(cxp(cfv(cbs, c5), csn(cv(s0))), cof(cfv(cvsca, c5)), cv(s1)))
  oveq123i(cxp(c3, csn(cv(s0))), cof(c4), cv(s1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c5), csn(cv(s0))), cof(cfv(cvsca, c5)), cv(s1))
  xpeq1i(c3, csn(cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c5))
  eqid(cv(s1))

blocks.name: mendlmod
blocks.content: The module endomorphism algebra is a left module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mendlmod(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, ccrg)), wcel(c2, clmod))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmend, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))
} = {
